nodes.text: A circus was a traveling company of entertainers that performed large public shows featuring clowns, acrobats, and trained animals. Preigo's Traveling World of Wonder, led by a Dug named Preigo, was one such company. When she was still a young princess in the making on Alderaan, Leia Organa wished she could run away to join a galactic circus rather than attending her etiquette lessons.
